Markus can you help me out in understanding how the Ant document is getting 
set up for the refactoring testing? Thanks

I could protect against the NPE but really it is a failure in the 
initialization of the document from the document provider.
Dirk, I think you can answer that better than I.

Thanks Dirk.

Yes, the Ant integration is now using the TextFileDocumentProvider and making 
use of the two core filebuffer extension points to register for *.xml files.

I have fixed up our code for this case.

Please verify the changes to PartiallySynchronizedDocument Kevin.
This code is used for the work in progress of incremental reconciling for the 
Ant model. 
This work has been deferred for 3.0....so I commented out this offending code.
DarinW, can you update the ant build notes for this one as well?
*** Bug 58624 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
